branchCategory.name: XLC, Aluminum High Vacuum Angle Valve, Double Acting, Bellows Seal
branchCategory.description: <p>XLC is a double acting high vacuum angle valve with a bellows seal for the shaft. The XL* family shares common features with all series members. Bodies are made of aluminum for lightweight and excellent thermal conductivity, resulting in a uniform temperature for the entire valve body. The body offers excellent resistance to fluorine corrosion. A low sputtering yield and the absence of heavy metals avoid wafer contamination.</p>
branchCategory.bullets: <UL> <LI>Air pressure applied to pilot port shifts piston-coupled valve <LI>Replaceable bellows reduces maintenance cost and waste material <LI>Additional maintenance parts available to extend useful life of valve <LI>Standard FKM seals, plus 8 additional seal compound options <LI>Auto switches mountable from 4 directions <LI>Optional 100°C and 150°C heaters (UL compliant lead wire) </LI></UL>

breadCrumb.name: XLC, Aluminum High Vacuum Angle Valve, Double Acting, Bellows Seal
